ground_truth.thought: 分析审批流程中的关键步骤
ground_truth.name: MortgageLender.analyze_approval_process

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'MortgageLender.get_application_requirements', 'description': 'Get the requirements for applying for a mortgage loan.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'requirements', 'description': 'a list of requirements for applying for a mortgage loan'}]}, {'name': 'MortgageLender.analyze_approval_process', 'description': 'Analyze the key steps in the mortgage loan approval process.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'steps', 'description': 'a list of key steps in the mortgage loan approval process'}]}, {'name': 'MortgageLender.get_approval_tips', 'description': 'Get tips to increase the chances of getting a mortgage loan approved.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'tips', 'description': 'a list of tips to increase the chances of getting a mortgage loan approved'}]}, {'name': 'MortgageLender.check_application_status', 'description': 'Check the current status of a mortgage loan application.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'application_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the mortgage loan application'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'status', 'description': 'the current status of the mortgage loan application'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我正在考虑申请抵押贷款，想了解整个审批流程。首先，我想知道申请抵押贷款需要满足哪些条件。接着，我想分析一下审批流程中的关键步骤。然后，我希望得到一些提高审批通过率的建议。最后，我想查询我当前的抵押贷款申请状态。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取抵押贷款的申请条件
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数是什么?
{'requirements': ['Credit score above 620', 'Stable employment history', 'Down payment of at least 3%', 'Debt-to-income ratio below 43%']}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'requirements': ['Credit score above 620', 'Stable employment history', 'Down payment of at least 3%', 'Debt-to-income ratio below 43%']}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是获取抵押贷款的申请条件，以便后续的申请和审批流程。
